Uses of Interface
org.joda.pa.MetaProperty

  • Packages that use MetaProperty 
    Package Description
    org.joda.pa
    The Property Alliance project is an effort to create a simple library to abstract access to properties on Java Beans and other data objects.

    • Uses of MetaProperty in org.joda.pa

      Methods in org.joda.pa that return types with arguments of type MetaProperty 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.stream.Stream<MetaProperty<?>> MetaBean.metaProperties()
      Gets the stream of properties associated with this bean.
      default Optional<MetaProperty<?>> MetaBean.metaProperty(String propertyName)
      Gets a single property by name.
      Methods in org.joda.pa with parameters of type MetaProperty 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object BeanBuilder.get(MetaProperty<?> property)
      Gets the value of a single property previously added to the builder.
      BeanBuilder<T> BeanBuilder.set(MetaProperty<?> property, Object value)
      Sets the value of a single property into the builder.
